thread.section_title: Walker Hotel Greenwich Village - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Unforgettable!!!
thread.title_full: Unforgettable!!! - Review of Walker Hotel Greenwich Village, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Issa H
title: Unforgettable!!!
text: The timeless Art Deco style made me feel like I was back in time.... I can't say enough about the staff, super friendly, extremely helpful and knowledgeable. Their restaurant The Society Cafe is a must try during your stay. I can't wait to come back and get spoiled all over again. Thanks Walker Hotel for a fabulous stay!!!
